description: Schema for updating user application status and details

applicationId.description: Unique identifier for the application to update

userId.description: User ID who owns the application

statusChangedDate.description: Date and time when the status was changed (ISO 8601 format, e.g., 2026-01-23T10:30:00Z)

notes.description: Additional notes or comments about the status update (e.g., interview stage, feedback)
